00016     template <unsigned D> struct NumAxes {
00017         enum { num = NumAxes<D-1>::num+D-1 };
00018     };
00020     template <> struct NumAxes<0> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00022     template <> struct NumAxes<1> { enum { num = 0 }; };
00023 
00025 
00034     template <unsigned D> class RotationAxes {
00035         public:
00041             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00042                 throw NotYetImplementedException(
00043                         "RotationAxes<"+Globals::Instance().itoa(D)+">::axis("+
00044                         Globals::Instance().itoa(which)+", "+
00045                         Globals::Instance().itoa(index)+")");
00046             }
00047         private:
00049             static unsigned _axis[2][NumAxes<D>::num];
00050     };
00051 
00053     template <> class RotationAxes<3> {
00054         public:
00060             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00061                 return _axis[which][index];
00062             }
00063         private:
00064             static const unsigned _axis[2][3];  
00065     };
00066 
00068     template <> class RotationAxes<4> {
00069         public:
00075             static unsigned axis(unsigned which, unsigned index) {
00076                 return _axis[which][index];
00077             }
00078         private:
00079             static const unsigned _axis[2][6];  
00080     };

00087     template <unsigned D, typename N = double> class Rotation {
00088 
00089         public:
00091             Rotation<D, N>(): axis() { }
00092 
00094 
00096             Rotation<D, N> (N r0, ... );
00097 
00099 
00101             N &operator[] (unsigned i);
00103 
00105             N operator[] (unsigned i) const;
00106 
00108 
00110             operator Matrix<D, N>() const;
00111 
00114             Rotation<D, N> &operator+= (const Rotation<D, N> &);
00115 
00117             operator bool() const { return axis.sqnorm() != 0.; }
00118 
00120             const Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> &r() const { return axis; }
00121 
00123             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> &r() { return axis; }
00124 
00125         private:
00127             Vector<NumAxes<D>::num, N> axis;
00128     };
00129 
00130     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::Rotation (N r0, ... ):
00131             axis() {
00132         axis[0] = r0;
00133         va_list argp;
00134         va_start (argp, r0);
00135         for (unsigned i = 1; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00136             axis[i] = va_arg (argp, N);
00137         }
00138         va_end (argp);
00139     }
00140 
00141     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00142             N &Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) {
00143         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00144         return axis[i];
00145     }
00146 
00147     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00148             N Rotation<D, N>::operator[] (unsigned i) const {
00149         assert(i < NumAxes<D>::num);
00150         return axis[i];
00151     }
00152 
00153     template <unsigned D, typename N> Rotation<D, N>::operator Matrix<D, N>() const {
00154         Matrix<D, N> R;
00155         for (unsigned i = 0; i < NumAxes<D>::num; i++) {
00156             if (axis[i]) {
00157                 R *= Matrix<D, N>(RotationAxes<D>::axis(0, i), RotationAxes<D>::axis(1, i), axis[i]);
00158             }
00159         }
00160         return R;
00161     }
00162 
00163     template <unsigned D, typename N>
00164             Rotation<D, N> &Rotation<D, N>::operator +=(const Rotation<D, N>& that) {
00165         axis += that.axis;
00166         return *this;
00167     }

00176             std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const Rotation<D, N> &v) {
00177         o << v.r();
00178         return o;
